name: Ice Face
description: This Pokemon's face is covered by a thick block of ice that serves as a cover of its body. If it breaks it will need a very cold temperature to form it again.
effect: The Pokemon has 2 extra HP when it is on “Ice Face form”. If the Ice receives 2 damage, change the Pokemon's form to “No-Ice Form”. To restore “Ice Face Form” the Pokemon must be out one whole Round while either Hail Weather or Snow Weather is active. This Ability cannot be swapped, copied, replaced or nullified (ignoring the effects of Skill Swap, Worry Seed, Gastro Acid, Trace etc.)
